title.narrative: Climate Adaptation in Coastal Communities of Myanmar: Improved Management of Mangrove Forests

description.narrative:
The overall strategic objective of the engagement is contribution to: Developing countries achieve low-carbon, climate resilient development and are able to implement the Paris agreement
The thematic objective is: Resilience to climate change among vulnerable and marginalised groups increased through sustainable development of mangrove forests

title.narrative: Improved resilience of local communities to climate change

Impact: Coastal communities’ resilience to climate change is strengthened through improved mangrove forest management. Indicator: Area of mangroves forest under sustainable management by community forest user groups and in Public Protected Forests (PPFs).
Baseline Year 2018 Baseline to be established including improved income and other benefits for community forest groups
Target Year 2023 Improved resilience and income for local coastal communities involved in mangrove forest management and utilization, especially fuel wood.
